item.title: php的Yaf框架类加载顺序研究
item.description: 代码 注册ini设置到global_library变量（yaf.c） STD_PHP_INI_ENTRY("yaf.library", "", PHP_INI_ALL, OnUpdateString, global_library, zend_yaf_globals, yaf_globals) 把global_library和local_library都
